description.value: You feel the call of the sky, or perhaps a desperate urge to test the limits of the earth's hold on you. When you or a creature you're mounted on attempts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump], you can spend a Mythic Point to allow you or the mount to attempt the check at mythic proficiency; determine the DC using the Long Jump DCs, and increase your maximum distance to double your Speed.
